desc: Shawcity are experts in Health & Safety, Occupational Hygiene and Environmental Monitoring applications, providing the highest levels of worker health protection.

layout.text: Life-saving Monitoring Instrumentation for Safer Workplaces

For 45 years, Shawcity’s instruments have been deployed across Health & Safety, Occupational Hygiene and Environmental Monitoring applications, providing the highest levels of worker health protection.
